AnalyticsWorkspaceAsset.name: AnalyticsWorkspaceAsset
AnalyticsWorkspaceAsset.description: Represents a Tableau Next asset in a workspace.

ActivePromotionRequestId.description: The ID of the active promotion request for the workspace asset.

AnalyticsWorkspaceId.description: The ID of the Tableau Next workspace the asset is associated with.

AssetUsageType.description: The type of usage for the asset.

HistoricalPromotionStatus.description: The historical promotion status for the asset.

MetadataSourceType.description: The source type of the asset metadata.
